title: Collaborative Media Production Program for Multimedia Literacy Development

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital tool proficiency and analytical skills for social phenomena
context.additional_context: Learners assume the role of ordinary citizens and collaboratively design and execute media production projects to solve social issues. The production environment utilizes personal devices (BYOD), with project-based assessment applied

learning_goals: Learners can collaboratively produce 5-minute multimedia content on social issues.
Learners can apply an 8-stage workflow (planning-storyboarding-shooting-editing-feedback-revision-sharing-evaluation) in the media production process.
Learners can analyze effective message delivery strategies for the target audience through the produced content.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
